import React from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import{Link,useNavigate,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{SunIcon,MoonIcon}from'lucide-react';import{useUser}from'../context/UserContext';import{ThemeContext}from'../context/ThemeContext';import{useContext}from'react';import'../Styles/Navbar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const{user,logout}=useUser();const{theme,toggleTheme}=useContext(ThemeContext);const navigate=useNavigate();const location=useLocation();const isAuthPage=location.pathname==='/login'||location.pathname==='/register';const handleLogout=()=>{logout();navigate('/');};// Single icon for theme, click to toggle
const ThemeIcon=theme==='light'?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SunIcon,{onClick:toggleTheme,className:"theme-icon",size:24}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MoonIcon,{onClick:toggleTheme,className:"theme-icon",size:24});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.nav,{className:"navbar",initial:{y:-100},animate:{y:0},transition:{type:'spring',stiffness:120},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{className:"navbar-logo",whileHover:{scale:1.1},whileTap:{scale:0.9},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"Happy Bakes"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-links",children:[!isAuthPage&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{whileHover:{scale:1.1},whileTap:{scale:0.9},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/Home",children:"Home"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{whileHover:{scale:1.1},whileTap:{scale:0.9},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/products",children:"Products"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{whileHover:{scale:1.1},whileTap:{scale:0.9},children:ThemeIcon})]}),user&&!isAuthPage?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{whileHover:{scale:1.1},whileTap:{scale:0.9},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/UserOrder",children:"Order"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{whileHover:{scale:1.1},whileTap:{scale:0.9},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"user-welcome",children:["Welcome, ",user.name]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{whileHover:{scale:1.1},whileTap:{scale:0.9},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogout,className:"logout-button",children:"Logout"})})]}):!isAuthPage&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{whileHover:{scale:1.1},whileTap:{scale:0.9},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",children:"Login"})})]})]});};export default Navbar;
